activities: PAREXEL is a clinical research organization that provides a broad range of research, development, and consulting services to it's pharmaceutical, biotech, and device company clients world-wide.  Because PAREXEL has offices/locations in many EU member countries, PAREXEL transfers personal data about its employees between members of the European Union and the United States.
contacttitle1: Americas Regional Privacy Officer and Senior Counsel, DP
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human resource, clinical research, patient, customer and supplier information in all formats, including electronically stored and manually processed information.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
